name: Gentry Venture Partners
overview:
Gentry Venture Partners is a specialized venture firm that leads or co-invests with some of the worldâ€™s premiere venture capital groups in mid and late-stage financing for pre-IPO companies. GVP is active in a broad spectrum of investment sectors with a primary focus on biotech, cleantech, energy, and information technology.

Since its inception in 2006, Gentry Venture Partners has invested in companies that have created a range of products and services to address market demands for new or disruptive innovations for existing industry sectors. Distinguished by the extensive business experience of their partners, and their strong network of syndicate groups, Gentry Venture Partners provides broad services to its portfolio companies.
